meanings.definition: A class of organic compounds containing two benzene rings linked by an oxygen atom.
meanings.sent1: Scientists are studying the properties of phthalins in the lab.
meanings.sent2: The phthalins are important in the field of chemistry.
meanings.sent3: The phthalins decided to throw a party in the test tube.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity sparkled like the shimmering phthalins.
meanings.sent5: The unique structure of phthalins makes them stand out in the chemical world.

meanings.definition: A type of chemical compound commonly used in the production of plastics and other materials.
meanings.sent1: Manufacturers rely on phthalins for making various plastic products.
meanings.sent2: The phthalins industry plays a significant role in the economy.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous phthalins escaped from the factory and went on an adventure.
meanings.sent4: His words were as flexible and adaptable as phthalins in manufacturing.
meanings.sent5: The smell of phthalins lingered in the air, reminding her of the production process.
